comment: Dr. Vega is incredibly caring and an extremely good professor. Our course was a mastering course, so we got to retake our tests/homework as many times as necessary and would give feedback on topics. Fantastic and deserving of all the praise she has received.
She is such a sweet person and is very considerate when it comes to grading and your learning. It is hard to not get an A in her class

Students who want to learn will always pass Dr. Vega's class with an A, especially those who struggle with tests. Her grading system rewards students who learn the material since you can retake previous assignments. Also, she gives tons of feedback on past assignments and she is great at answering questions. Absolutely incredible professor.

Calculus is a difficult subject regardless of professor, but Dr. Vega is a skilled teacher. Has a deep understanding and passion for the topic. She is merciful. Allows you to reassess any exam topic on which you perform poorly. This can completely recover bad grades. Gives you credit for your understanding even when your work isn't perfect. Great.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: The tests are short and sweet. You are able to reassess the tests as many times as you want. You can only redo one question at a time though. She was a great professor who really cared. She was very easy to reach and was always willing to help you! I recommend her to anyone who is willing to go just a little further to keep a good grade.

I thought differential equations would be harder but Dr. Vega made this class easy. I did the whole class online with no problem. The homework is not graded and is only used as a benefit for you. The tests weren't that bad and you were able to make corrections or reassess if needed. Had 1 project that was pretty difficult but do-able. Recommend her
Fantastic professor - gives you many chances to make sure you understand the content and succeed. Would definitely take again.
